channel.title: RSCD Sprite Packer
channel.description:
Hey viewers. I just got taught how to use RSCD Sprite Packer and I edit the colour and what not, save it, run packer, take the sprites.rscd put in my client and know whatever i edit e.g Money, its 2x bigger than the original size. Its like a fucking whopper burger.
Can anyone please tell me how to fix this?
Thx
